title: Alright GD, it's been a while now: Windows 10.
body:
To upgrade, or not to upgrade? That is the question.

IMO Win 8 was pretty crappy and I think the trend has been Great -> bad -> Great -> bad.

( XP -> Vista -> 7 -> 8; others like 95 and 2000 were good from what I saw, but I'm unsure of the order back then )

Who upgraded and what is your experience? I see positive things about Win10 about everywhere I look so I'm leaning towards it, but better safe than sorry I guess.
